meeting_day_three-default-start.text: Well... I suppose this is it, then
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: Realistically is there anything we can do at this point​?
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: Oh, come on...! So you're both just giving up? And you too, Pink?
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: There's no need to despair. What are you afraid of?
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: Is that a serious question? I'm afraid of everything and everyone I've ever known being reduced to ash!
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: I refuse to accept this. I –
meeting_day_three-default-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_three-default-start.text: (You look around and notice that everyone in the room is completely still)
(Suddenly you hear something coming from outside the lab... music?)
